entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 2:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
